title: 头上戴一个自定义花纹的旗帜～
author: 待归来去兮
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2020-7-31 16:16 编辑 

replaceitem entity @e[type=Player,c=1] slot.armor.head glass
已知这么个指令，就是戴上特定旗帜
minecraft:banner 1 15 {BlockEntityTag:{Base:15,Patterns:[{Pattern:flo,Color:14}]}}

怎么嵌进去

replies.author: Peanutz_OwO
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Peanutz_OwO 于 2020-7-31 12:40 编辑 

/replaceitem entity @a[c=1] slot.armor.head minecraft:banner 1 15 {BlockEntityTag:{Base:15,Patterns:[{Pattern:flo,Color:14}]}}
1.13-

/replaceitem entity @a[limit=1] armor.head minecraft:white_banner{BlockEntityTag:{Base:15,Patterns:[{Pattern:flo,Color:14}]}} 1
1.13+

replies.author: 诺言T
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 诺言T 于 2020-7-31 12:31 编辑 

replaceitem entity @e[type=Player,c=1] slot.armor.head minecraft:banner 1 15 {BlockEntityTag:{Base:15,Patterns:[{Pattern:flo,Color:14}]}}

replies.author: dragonwby
replies.txt_content:
做这个更简单的方法是，先把自己想要的花纹做出来丢地上，然后用/data get entity @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest] 来获取它的nbt吧？
这样可以举一反三
